spec_data.Name: texlive-gillcm
spec_data.Description:
This is a demonstration of the use of virtual fonts for unusual
effects: the package implements an old idea of Eric Gill. The
package was written for the author's talk at TUG 2010.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:38:13 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Alternative unslanted italic Computer Modern fonts
